source_setting.source: select inner_q.uuid, patent_id, date, number, country, category, sequence, CONCAT(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '^[a-zA-Z]+'), LPAD(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '[0-9]+$'), 8-LENGTH(REGEXP_SUBSTR(patent_id, '^[a-zA-Z]+')), '0')) as patent_zero_prefix from (select uuid from elastic_production.foreign_citations where uuid > '{offset}' order by uuid limit {limit}) inner_q join elastic_production.foreign_citations fc on fc.uuid = inner_q.uuid
